chapters.title: Chapter 20: Questions of Treason
chapters.info: Tuli, p. 411 (472)—Egwene's name as a damane. Bethamin went to check on her, the “girl with the remarkable affinity for metals and ores,” before the battle at Falme. When Bethamin arrived, she found the two sul'dam that Egwene and her rescuers captured. See also al'Vere, Egwene.
